title: Map Skins
body:
Hi guys, so i was thinking about how i'd  like to see new maps but i don't really have the skills or imagination to come up with that stuff but i was thinking along the lines of map skins according to the different states or regions. 

Map skins for summoners rift that look like the actual region example : Demacian summoner's rift would have that whole white city feel to it with big white statues for towers and nice stone paved lanes etc. I think that would be cool. It would give more exposure to the lol universe and all and also give us players something cool to look at.

It's just a thought team Rito, i don't have any artistic talents so i can't really help with that.
But what do you guys think???
